segments.text: I'm afraid I have lost my air ticket while I was shopping .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm sorry to hear that.Did you check your shoulder bag carefully ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I checked again and again , but I can't find it . By the day after tomorrow , can I have the ticket reissued ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I talked with the manager over the phone and he told me I can have it reissued because I have a copy of my lost ticket .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I see . I'll call the manager , then .
segments.speaker: S2
